name: Sound Designer
description: Responsible for creating and designing the overall sound landscape of a production

name: Re-recording Mixer
description: Mixes the final audio track combining dialogue, sound effects, and music

name: Audio Post Producer
description: Oversees the entire audio post-production process

name: Sound Editor
description: Edits and organizes sound effects and dialogue

name: Dialogue Editor
description: Edits and cleans up dialogue tracks

name: ADR Supervisor
description: Supervises the automated dialogue replacement process

name: Foley Artist
description: Creates and records sound effects for footsteps, props, and other practical sounds

name: Production Sound Mixer
description: Records audio on set during production

name: Music Supervisor
description: Selects and supervises music for the production

name: Audio Engineer
description: Technical audio specialist for recording and mixing
